import React from "react"; // nodejs library that concatenates classes import classNames from "classnames"; // react plugin used to create charts import { Line, Bar, Doughnut } from "react-chartjs-2"; // reactstrap components import { Button, ButtonGroup, Modal, ModalBody, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardTitle, DropdownToggle, DropdownMenu, DropdownItem, UncontrolledDropdown, Label, FormGroup, Input, Table, Row, Col, UncontrolledTooltip, Container } from "reactstrap"; // core components import { chartExample1, chartAppointment, chartExample3, chartExample4 } from "variables/charts.js"; class Settings extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { modalBank: false, bigChartData: "data1" }; } toggleModalBank = () => { this.setState({ modalBank: !this.state.modalBank }); }; render() { return ( <>
Personal Details Bank Details

Basic Information

PRICING AND DURATION
); } } export default Settings;
